step_1.title: Submit Your Request
step_1.description: You submit a request on the website or contact us via the phone number provided on the site.

step_2.title: Agreement
step_2.description: We consult you, agree on the price and the exact time of arrival of our specialist.

step_3.title: Product Shipping and Installation
step_3.description: Our lock installation specialist arrives at your location at the agreed time.

feature_1.title: Double Cost Refund
feature_1.description: For every faulty product sent, we will refund you double the cost.

feature_2.title: Installation
feature_2.description: We perform installation work of any complexity at a time convenient for you.
